簺，读sài，是汉语词汇，指古代的一种棋戏，亦是指用竹木编成的捕鱼工具。
簺, pronounced sài, is a Chinese vocabulary that refers to an ancient chess game, and also refers to a fishing tool made of bamboo and wood.

簺字的基本解释

簺
sài
古代一种赌博性游戏，亦称“格五”：“酒酣博簺为欢娱，信手枭卢喝成采。”
用竹木编成的断水捕鱼的栏栅：“曾见人以簺捕鱼者，出绢买而放之。”

簺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sài］
［《廣韻》先代切，去代，心。］
(1)即格五戏。古代的一种博戏。
(2)以竹木编成的拦水捕鱼的用具。

簺字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　簺； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页901第48
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?先代切，音賽。【說文】行棋相塞謂之簺。【前漢·吾丘壽王傳註】格五棋行簺法曰：塞白乘五，至五格不得行，故云格五。【註】師古曰：卽今戲之簺也。【後漢·梁冀傳註】《鮑宏·簺經》。　又【韻會】通作塞，莊子博塞。　又【類篇】編竹木斷水取魚也。

簺字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
簺字的起名意思

暂无。

簺
Basic explanation of words
簺
sài
A kind of gambling game in ancient times, also known as "Give Five": "Beverages of wine and booze are fun and entertaining.
A fence made of bamboo and wood for fishing without water: "I have seen people who fished with a crocodile and bought them out of silk and put them away."
簺
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sài］
["Guangyun" cut from generation to generation, to generation, heart. ]
(1) Immediately five plays. An ancient gambling game.
(2) Water blocking fishing gear made of bamboo and wood.

[Not set on] [Bamboo characters department] 　簺; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 901 48
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? First generation cut, sound competition. [Said the text] The game of chess is said to be stubborn. [Previous Han·Wuqiu Shouwang Biography] The method of the five grids is said: Saibai multiplies by five, and it is impossible to reach five grids, so the cloud grid is five. [Note] Shi Gu said: The 簺 also of the present drama. [Annotation to the Later Han·Liang Ji Biography] "Bao Hong·簺经".　[Yunhui] Tong is a stopper, Zhuangzi Bosai.　[Classes] Weave bamboo and wood to cut water and fish.
